title: ‘Fast But Not Crazy:’ Matej Mohorič Dives to Victory in Another Descending Master Class
content:
UPDATED: Bahrain Victorious star reminds every one of his superb descending skills in his season debut in Spain to win stage 2 at the Volta Valenciana.

Read the full article at ‘Fast But Not Crazy:’ Matej Mohorič Dives to Victory in Another Descending Master Class on Velo.
author: ahood
